input_text:
CREATIVE GRAPHIC DESIGNER

SUMMARY

After reviewing your post with much interest, please take into consideration my qualifications and work experiences in your search. As an exceptionally versatile
Graphic Designer/Artist, with 19 years of expertise in marketing, advertising, packaging and publishing; working for a variety of industries in medical, education, B2C and Corporate.
My objective now, is to find a position that will utilize my abilities, challenge and expand upon my creativeness and knowledge; while I provide my artistic assets in art and design to the benefit of an organization such as yours.
My skill set includes designing from concept all the way through to production, high-end catalogs, advertisements, brochures, trade show graphics, posters, packaging, direct mailers, presentations, medical journals, educational books and more.
Utilizing Adobe CS6, Acrobat Professional and I-Books Author.
In addition to, Microsoft Office, various databases, time management and soft-skill applications on both Mac and PC operating systems.
From the School of Visual Arts, I received a Bachelor of Fine Arts with a major in Illustration and a minor in Computer Arts.
I am a resourceful, reliable self-starter; whether collaborating within a team environment or working independently with minimal supervision.
Every assignment big or small is performed with a love for art and design from start to finish and attention to detail and deadlines.
If you are interested, please call to further discuss my qualifications and how I may be a valuable future member for your team.

SKILLS

Children's Trade K -12 Book Packaging Medical Publication Product Packaging
Advertising Trade Show Graphics Catalogs & Brochures Presentations & Hand-Outs

output_json.summary: Exceptionally versatile Graphic Designer/Artist with 19 years of expertise in marketing, advertising, packaging, and publishing across various industries.

description: Design new speculative advertising and/or enhance existing campaigns for small to mid-size business clients.
Verbal/written communication with clients, media consultants to present and/or springboard design ideas.
Support Marketing and Sales division by creating collateral and training material.
Utilize LiveMeeting and Webcast for brainstorming, presenting, or troubleshooting design issues.
Facilitate creative design from start to finish for all promotional, marketing, and visual needs.
Collaborate with marketing on concept, design, and schedules for advertising and marketing materials.
Communicate with publishers, digital, and print vendors to ensure work meets pub dates and quality standards.
Design, layout, illustration, and production of feature articles, monthly articles, contents page, infographics, charts, and graphs for medical journals and Pharma-sponsored supplements.
Liaison with medical editorial director, art director, and graphic designers to meet monthly publication dates.
Package design of licensed products and create mock mechanicals for client approval.
Technical illustration and enhancement of existing CAD illustrations for instruction leaflets.
Design and production of catalog inserts, product instructional leaflets, and gift wrapping.
Design board books for licensed children's trade books.
Composed cover art using company-approved art templates, stylesheets, colors, and artwork.
Design seasonal feature catalog inserts for Reader's Digest Children Books catalogs and promo-brochures.
